title: Stunning Luxury in Heart of Mission- Modern Living
posting_body: A spacious, modern, light filled flat centrally located in the heart of the Mission in one of the most distinct building's with the famous Dharma Mural.
Price reduced from $8500 pre  Covid to $6200  now.
It is a TWO level unit with 2 bedroom And 2 bathroom on 4th floor and 2 bedroom and bathroom on 3rd floor.
So you will not feel claustrophobic with room mates.
And in these days with everyone working from home, this is a very important space.
The flat comprises of
- 4 spacious bedrooms
- Large living room with views of Twin Peaks
- 3 Full bathrooms
- Gourmet kitchen with granite counters, gas stove, dishwasher, and garbage disposal
- Washer/Dryer in the unit
Located on the 22nd St corridor, this place is near just about everything.
Popular restaurants, night life, cafe's, and hangouts are a stones throw away located downstairs and along Mission and Valencia street's.
Right across from The Make Out Room.
Thursday Farmers Market is just outside your building on 22nd Street.
-2 blocks from 24th
St BART
-MUNI bus down half the  block
-Commuter bus routes nearby
-Easy access to Freeways 101 and 280 .
ONE CAR PRIVATE GARAGE AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $350 .
Reply with your phone# to schedule a private showing.
